transport.question: I go beep beep! I have wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 Grown ups drive me
🚦 I stop at red lights
🅿️ You park me in a parking spot

transport.question: I go choo choo! I ride on tracks. What am I?

hints.text: 🚝 I am very long
📣 People ride me to different cities
🚂 I have many cars connected together

transport.question: I float on water. I can be big or small. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I do not fly
⚓ I need an anchor to stay still
🛳️ Sometimes people go on vacations on me

transport.question: I fly in the sky. I have wings. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am faster than a car
✈️ You can travel to far away places with me
💺 People sit in seats on me

transport.question: I have two wheels, and you push me with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 Boys and girls use me
🛴 I am for one person
🦶 You push off the ground with your foot.

transport.question: I'm big and yellow, and take lots of children to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🧑‍🏫 The driver helps the kids get on and off.
🛑 I have a sign that says stop.
🎒 Many school kids ride me in the mornings.

transport.question: I help people who are hurt, and I go very fast! What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I make a loud siren noise
🏥 I take people to the hospital.
🚑️ I am a type of vehicle

transport.question: I carry lots of things, and I'm very big. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 You can find me on the highway.
🚚 I have many wheels.
⛽ I help move items from one place to another.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky, but I'm not an airplane. I have a big fan on top!

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one spot.
⚕️ I am useful to rescue people.
💫 I have a rotating blade on top of me.

transport.question: I take people up a mountain! I ride on cables!

hints.text: 🏔️ I go up, up, up.
🚠 I am not very fast.
☃️ You will find me in snowy places

cosmos.question: I am big and bright and come out at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I shine in the dark sky
😴 You see me when you go to bed
🧀 Sometimes people say I look like cheese

cosmos.question: I am hot and yellow and give you light and warmth in the daytime. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I am very, very big!
😎 You shouldn't look directly at me
🌻 Plants need me to grow

cosmos.question: I twinkle in the night sky, far, far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I'm small and bright
🌌 There are many of us
🌃 You see me when it's dark

cosmos.question: I am a big ball, and you live on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I have land and water
🏠 People build houses on me
🌳 Plants grow on me

cosmos.question: The moon goes around me. I go around the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I'm mostly green and blue
🧑‍🚀 Astronauts have visited me
🌱 Plants and animals live here

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas that makes light. I am far away and very hot. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I give the Earth warmth
☀️ I am yellow and big
🪐 Other planets go around me

cosmos.question: I am a big, round rock that goes around the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I come out at night
🌚 Sometimes I am full, sometimes I am a crescent
🐺 Werewolves like me!

cosmos.question: I'm a giant collection of stars, dust, and gas. Our sun is a part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I have many stars in me
✨ I look like a fuzzy band of light in the night sky
🥛 Some people call me the Milky Way

cosmos.question: I am a cold, dark, and mostly empty place that contains stars and planets. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 You need a spaceship to visit me
🖤 I am very big and empty
🌌 Everything is in me

cosmos.question: Sometimes, I fall from the sky like a shooting star, burning up in the Earth's atmosphere. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am made of rock and metal
🔥 I make a bright streak of light
🌠 People make wishes on me
